amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for using major sports sponsorships, such as NASCAR motor sports and bass fishing, as military recruitment tools by $72.3 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funds for recruiting in the armed services, and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 216 (Roll no. 473).
